message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for both of us to come to a mutually beneficial agreement. As the starting point, I'd like to offer you the product for $15000. I think this is a fair price considering its value to you.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12500. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm still looking to get a better price for the product. Considering its value to you, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $13500. It's a fair compromise that I believe we can both agree on.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $13000 for the product. Can we meet at this price?

I understand your desire to save some money, Bob, but I'm still looking to get a good price for the product. I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to get closer to my target price. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $13250. It's a slight increase from your offer, but I believe it's still a fair compromise.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $12900 for the product. Can we meet at this price?

I understand your persistence, Bob, but I'm getting close to my minimum acceptable price. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my target. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $13200. It's a slight increase from your offer, but I believe it's still a fair compromise.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $12800 for the product. Can we meet at this price?

I'm getting close to my limit, Bob, and I'm not willing to go any lower. I'm willing to make one final concession, but I need to get closer to my target. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $13100. It's my final offer, and I'm not willing to negotiate further.
